prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

Promptbook has introduced new features including support for DeepSeek models, Working the Book language v1.0.0, and the ability to run books from CLI using "npx ptbk run path/to/your/book". It now supports .docx, .doc, and .pdf documents as knowledge sources.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
